UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel Cathelicidins from Pigeon Highlights Evolutionary Convergence in Avain Cathelicidins and Functions in Modulation of Innate Immunity.
Literature.Author: Yu H, Lu Y, Qiao X, Wei L, Fu T, Cai S, Wang C, Liu X, Zhong S, Wang Y
